txt.en: Talk to Cada at the mine
You have found Yago, slain by the vicious bugan
You found Wilim at the end of a blocked tunnel, alive and well
You have found Matho, slain by the vicious bugan
A handful of miners remain unaccounted for after the retreat from the Barnavon Mine.
You have found Siam, alive and well
You have found Inir, alive and well

'So, old Gwilum sent you to help us? There are few among the Uch-l√ªth of Carreglyn upon whom I do not wish death and torment, but he is one of them.

'Very well. I will tell you my trouble, and you will tell me if you will help, duvodiad. When the bugan attacked, we fought our way to freedom; however some few of us did not come out of the mine: Yago, Wilim, Siam, Matho, and Inir.

'What say you? Will you enter the mine and find them?'
Yago, Wilim, Siam, Matho, and Inir are lost in the Barnavon Mine.\n\nCada asked you to enter the Barnavon Mine and find the missing miners.

'You have earned my trust and friendship, [placeholder]. I wish only that you had been able to bring all of the miners out safely.\n\n'Yago and Matho both had families who will suffer for their loss. The Ox-clan cares not for the well-being of my people.'
Cada is at the camp outside the Barnavon Mine.\n\nYou should return to Cada with news of your success.
